Submodules¶

src.clean_data module¶

src.clean_data.clean(school_path='../data/hsls_09_school_v1_0.csv', student_path='../data/hsls_16_student_v1_0.csv')[source]¶

This method preprocesses the data for both schools and students and returns dataframe objects corresponding to each of these factors.

Returns a list of the following: Dataframe object containing school variables. Dataframe object containing student variables.

Parameters

  • school_path (str) – Path to the school.csv file

  • student_path (str) – Path to the student.csv file

Returns

Cleaned school and student data.

Return type

tuple of two pandas.DataFrame

src.config module¶

src.multivariate_methods module¶

class src.multivariate_methods.MLmodel(file_loc='../data/student_data.csv')[source]¶

Bases: object

predict_model(input_data)[source]¶

returns model’s prediction for the input_data :param input_data: dict, a dictionary with fields as keys and a scalar value or a list of values for each field, depending upon the number of samples :return: returns a 1-d numpy array with predicted y value for each sample

train_model(y, fields, num_trees=100, test_split=0)[source]¶

train a machine learning model with y as dependent variable and variables in fields parameter as independent variables :param test_split: float, if non-zero, train-test split is performed and training and test accuracy is returned else model trained on complete data and training accuracy along with -1 in place of test accuracy returned. :param num_trees: number of estimators in the random forest model :param y: string, dependent variable, should be numerical/continuous :param fields: list, list of independent variables, can be numerical or categorical :return: returns a tuple with training accuracy and test accuracy if test_split > 0 else a tuple with training accuracy and -1 in place of test accuracy.

src.multivariate_methods.get_correlation_matrix(fields, file_loc='../data/student_data.csv')[source]¶

Computes correlation matrix that captures correlation between features presented in the fields parameter

Parameters

  • fields (list) – List of fields

  • file_loc (str) – Path to the dataset

Returns

Correlation matrix.

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

src.univariate_methods.get_stats(field, file_loc='../data/student_data.csv', median=True)[source]¶

Returns min,median(mean) and max of a numerical field

Parameters

  • median (bool) – Returns median as the middle value if True, else mean

  • field (str) – variable name

  • file_loc (str) – Path to the dataset

Returns

tuple(min, max, median (mean))

Return type

tuple

src.univariate_methods.get_var_info(file_loc='../data/variables.csv')[source]¶

Get variable information Usage 1. Single variable: get_var_info(“N1ALTCERT”) 2. Batch variables: get_var_info([“N1ALTCERT”, “N1COURSE”])

Parameters

Returns

A pd.DataFrame associated with the variable or a subset of pd.DataFrame corresponds to each variable in name.
